title: 3. What Would the World Look Like if Economists Were in Charge?
description: In this episode we speculate what would happen if economists got to run the world. Hear from a high-end call girl; an Estonian who ran his country according to the gospel of Milton Friedman; and a guy who wants to start building new nations in the middle of the ocean.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
